main_definition: Style refers to a distinctive manner or way of doing things, often used to describe the unique characteristics in various aspects like fashion, writing, art, etc.

meanings_and_examples.example: She has an elegant and minimalist fashion style, preferring simple black dresses.
The author's writing style is very descriptive, painting vivid images with his words.
Cubism was an artistic movement that introduced a new style of abstract representation in the early 20th century.
His practical approach to problem-solving involved breaking down issues into smaller, manageable tasks.
The technical style of the presentation was clear and concise, making complex information easily understandable.
